Bash(git -C "C:/Users/r7y23s6/Documents/aidensite" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix game over screen, improve tsunami visuals, 3D obstacles, disasters, packs, and luck system

- Game over screen: fixed layout with pinned Try Again button, clears earthquake shake on death
- Tsunami: layered 3D geometry \(4 water layers, foam chunks, spray spheres, turbulence streaks, sway animation\)
- Obstacles: replaced emoji sprites with 3D boulders, crates, concrete walls, and bunkers \(zone-tinted\)
- Shelters: rebuilt as solid 3D bunkers with overhanging roofs and sandbag flanks
- Wave mechanics: waves now spawn ahead of player and roll toward them \(no more hits from behind\)
- Disasters: random earthquakes \(camera shake + screen rumble\) and lightning strikes between waves
- Spin wheel: added 1.25x / 2x / 5x / 10x luck multipliers that boost rare item odds
- Shop: added Starter Pack \(1000c -> 500c + 1 galaxy box\) and Pro Pack \(10000c -> 5000c + 3 galaxy boxes\)
- Area transition: moved popup to compact upper-right corner toast
- Gate beams: removed wide crossbeam, shortened pillars to stop blocking vision
